sen.j: 景行天皇が熊襲征伐の帰りに豊後国日田郡に立ち寄った際にヒサツヒメと名乗る神が人に姿を変えて出迎え、郡内の様子を話したと豊後風土記にあるほかには、この神が現れる話は見当たらない。
sen.e: There can not be found any tale which takes up this goddess except for the account in "Bungo no Kuni Fudoki" that when Emperor Keiko returning from the Conquest of Kumaso (a tribe living in the ancient Kyushu district) came to Hita country in Bungo Province, a goddess who called herself Hisatsu-hime had changed her figure into a human and went to meet him, and talked him about the state of the country.

sen.e: One opinion is that she was Himiko of Yamatai-Koku kingdom, and another view is that a woman who was in the almost same position about the same period as her was enshrined as a goddess after the death.
